## SmartFormModal class

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The Smart Form Modal element. Allows to open a modal with an auto-generated form based on the resource schema.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SmartFormModal extends EntityManagement 
```
**Extends:** [EntityManagement](./foundation-entity-management.entitymanagement.md)
